Morning Prayer.sanskrit:
कराग्रे वसate लक्ष्मीः करमध्ये सरस्वती।
करमूले स्थितो ब्रह्मा प्रभाते करदर्शनम्॥
Morning Prayer.transliteration:
Karāgre vasate Lakṣhmīḥ karamadhye Sarasvatī,
Karamūle sthito Brahmā prabhāte karadarśanam.
Morning Prayer.english: On the tips of my fingers resides Goddess Lakshmi, in the middle resides Saraswati, at the base resides Brahma. Thus, I look at my hands every morning.

Evening Prayer.sanskrit:
राम रामेति रामेति रमे रामे मनोरमे।
सहस्रनाम तत्तुल्यं रामनाम वरानने॥
Evening Prayer.transliteration:
Rāma Rāmeti Rāmeti Rame Rāme Manorame,
Sahasranāma Tattulyaṁ Rāmanāma Varānane.
Evening Prayer.english: Chanting the name of Lord Rama is equal to chanting the thousand names of Lord Vishnu.

Bhojan Mantra (Before Meals).english: May the one who provides this food be happy.
